description: Every place got a story, but this one needs more attention than most. Here's the story. Our sweetie Candy has opened a restaurant in town, which attracts many foodies. Never got a Michelin-star though, this place has won a good reputation for its tasty foods and warm service. However, she feels a little overwhelmed recently, for the increasing number of customers keeps her two hands more than full. She really needs a sue chef's help to take a break.We see the passion for cooking in your eyes, so do you think you can do this? Are you desperate to cook but concerned that you may make a mess, or afraid of hot stoves and sharp knives? Budding chef, dear. Don't worry, here you can cook freely without being troubled by those things. You'll be more than happy to make some handsome foods to sink the customer's teeth into grand feasts. The fantastic experience not just lies in cooking, but also in decorating and cleaning. Even dressing Candy will be a great joy.It’s not easy to run a business, but trust us, you can definitely nail it. Honey, this is a place where cooking is no longer a have to do thing, but a pleasure. Let's take it to an art form!How to playOpen the game, your first view will be the well-decorated lobby. See! The customer's already here, let's take his order. Click him to check the information related to the dish, which includes the picture and cooking steps. With carefully chosen ingredients and superb kitchen utensils, you can make a visually stunning and great tasting dish for sure. As you know every chef has his signature dish, it's also true that every restaurant has its secret recipe, which can be found on the right top. There are 5 secret recipes for each kind of food to be discovered. Exciting, huh? To a chef, there's no place like restaurant, so you must want to improve this place more than anyone else. Now, wish granted! Each time you make a dish, you'll be awarded a loving heart, with which you can exchange for some top-notch decorations to beautify this place. You can click the loving heart icon on the top right to have a look. Wow~ that clean cart is so nice, let's work hard for it. Because you know, keeping this place in a clean and sanitary condition is also part of your job. Oh~ our dear is a little bit upset, hurry to check on her. Ah, she got no time to change her clothes the whole day, so why don't you give her a makeover?Here's the journey of working your way to a master chef from a home cook. Chef, shall we set off? Features:- 10 delicacies with great flavor are offered  - 50 secret recipes are waiting for you to discover- Dress up Candy and show us your wonderful taste in clothes- Get in touch with the marvelous world of cooking- Collect more loving hearts to make this place better   About Libii Game:With over 200 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for kids. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.Visit us: http://www.libii.com/Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGameContact us:Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Please feel free to contact us 24/7 at WeCare@libii.comNeed You Know:This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

As you know every chef has his signature dish, it's also true that every restaurant has its secret recipe, which can be found on the right top. There are 5 secret recipes for each kind of food to be discovered. Exciting, huh?

To a chef, there's no place like restaurant, so you must want to improve this place more than anyone else. Now, wish granted! Each time you make a dish, you'll be awarded a loving heart, with which you can exchange for some top-notch decorations to beautify this place. You can click the loving heart icon on the top right to have a look. Wow~ that clean cart is so nice, let's work hard for it. Because you know, keeping this place in a clean and sanitary condition is also part of your job. Oh~ our dear is a little bit upset, hurry to check on her. Ah, she got no time to change her clothes the whole day, so why don't you give her a makeover?

Here's the journey of working your way to a master chef from a home cook. Chef, shall we set off?

Features:
- 10 delicacies with great flavor are offered
- 50 secret recipes are waiting for you to discover
- Dress up Candy and show us your wonderful taste in clothes
- Get in touch with the marvelous world of cooking
- Collect more loving hearts to make this place better

With over 200 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for kids. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.

Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGame
Contact us:
Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Please feel free to contact us 24/7 at WeCare@libii.com

This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

comments: I'm really fond of this game and love the gameplay and quick paced matches. The new update is AMAZING!   There are a few things that would make this game extra perfect for me!   Must have character customisation. This would be amazing to me. Char customisation makes me bind more to certain characters. The rings we get don't have much value to them except for upgrading the characters.  Could have non-ranked matches. I would love the option to play/practice against rivals or my own friends.   Should have quick chat responses. Would like to communicate before and after the match with simple reactions. Like Good luck and I win, tee-hee!

To many ads unless you make some kind of purchase. Loading screens seem to take longer than I'd like. You can't at this time play with friends as Opponents are automatically chosen. There is still some characters ability noise in the game even if you have music and sound off. I'd like to see characters abilities not to be so similar, but it isn't taking away from the game at the moment for me. With all that said though the graphics are great, the game is fun, and it's worth the $1.99 purchase I made.

This is one of the best mobile games I have played I a while. I probobly have a bias sense I love Sonic so much. However, if one thing could be added I would say it should be a converter for the Red Star rings to normal rings. Unless you want them to be payed for. I don't really care either way I'll just buy the Red Star rings but I brought up that idea because I currently have 23,000 rings just kinda waiting to be spent. Maybe incorporate phone backgrounds or some customizations for the game that cost extra rings? Thankyou so much for the new update and if anyone I'd debating on installing it just get it. You'll have fun, trust me.

It's basically Sonic Dash PVP mode. But that doesn't change the fact it's fun. Love the steady support of adding new characters and how every character feels unique despite everyone playing the same (sounds weird but you'll understand after you play it) my only gripe is that when I want to play I have to start the app, close it, then restart again otherwise it never loads

A fun premise ruined by a horrendous match making system,  ridiculous  unlocking time gates, and obvious pay to win incentives.  You'll be constantly matched with players with levels far higher than your own and the rewards are minimal for the all the effort.  The constant ads that play after every match is beyond irritating.

Love the game, but there's something wrong.. Well... I think Cream is kinda rigged. Her items are a bit OP for the other players which makes it an easy stage into a extremely hard stage. And also, the deduction of trophies in 4th place is too much! Please make it lower (like maybe at around 5 or 8) and change the deduction of trophies in 3rd place 0 (These are all just suggestions I have). If you read this SEGA, your games are great and keep up the good work!

comments: I love that you don't lose troops while defending. The only problem is the cost to heal them is rediculous. There are many aggressive players that assault you early on in the game and unless you pay money it becomes difficult to maintain a stable civilization. I believe it would be better if there were cheaper or easier ways to gain resources for those whom don't pay to win. Thank you for the amazing game though! Love you guys and I will never quit playing!

I watched commercials about this on YouTube and after downloading the game I was very disappointed about the graphics. It's more like a crudely drawn cartoon. It seems OK, but there's not a whole lot of variations from other games in this category. Wish the developers of these games would add a new feature or two just to make it stand out. I'm going to keep playing but if it doesn't get better after a while I'll probably unistall.

The admins take too long to respond. Do not waste any money in this game. They took my account away when I switched phones and its been over a week. Meanwhile, all my troops got destroyed and my game is ruined. And I've spent over $60 real money. You would think they'd take care of a money spender but no. They just ghosted me.

The support for this game is a joke.  I have been playing for 3 months and they have yet to correct a single thing.  I still can't bind to my Facebook and their resolution was to start over even though I have spent well over 100 bucks on this app.  Very disappointing.

I like the game. Has a few things that are a pain though. Like you cant share resources if they were bought, what does that even matter. I also dont like that your avatar can only be your facebook pic or an in game one..give me the option to upload my own pic without changing my facebook one.

Very unbalanced.  Dominated by purple, orange, and blue hordes. If you start as any other horde color you will be raided constantly with no support. Be prepared to spend lots of money on peace shields...

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. comments: l was enjoying the game a lot and would have given it 5 stars. l spent a long time to get enough bricks to  build a level 7 home so dragons only needed 7 mins sleep.. NOW    only  the same 5 of my 30 dragons get out and this is making collecting bricks and healing power very slow. l have not seen all my green dragons and moon dragons( the hardest workers) for 2 days now. developers please help or l will stop playing. TY.

Buggy.  The game itself was pretty good but there are issues with the cloud save deleting peoples games + all their in-app purchases (like me). The support for the game is non-existent. They have one email address to send issues to, and it's been weeks, almost a month, since and there has been no response. So everything is gone and they can't be bothered to try and restore my account for a month.   In short, it was fun and addictive, but your game will delete itself eventually and the support staff doesn't care since they already have your money.

I would love to give this game 5 stars but 99% of the ground I've uncovered is covered by "treasure chests" and there's no way to get rid of them or contact the game makers for help. I've completely run out of space and can't play anymore. The chests should disappear after 3 - 5 days if they're not opened.

Love this game. Graphics are great and so much to do. Keeps me going for ages. Main concern and the reason I've not rated 5 star is the time it takes to get each token. When some levels take 7 and it takes half a day to fill up it's a major pain. Then you do a level that needs 4 and the next also 4 it takes the p*ss. Would be great to have a higher limit without getting charged or for them to fill up quicker. If this was done I would rate 5 star all round.

Playing this game makes me lose track of time. Wish we could buy the dragon egg chests with game coins.  That would be greatly helpful. Please consider this. Also would be great to transfer items from other levels back to the camp, like eggs, flowers, etc. Plz have this feature.Thanks. Plus would help if there was a set button to hit to exit the game. I am finding it takes between a few to about 5 times to hit the back button on my tablet. Plz fix, would make things alot quicker.

This game is almost perfect!  I love almost everything about it, though it would be nice if chalices recharged faster, and dragon gems weren't so rare.  Also, since the latest update, levels will spontaneously crash the game if you play them too long, which is hard to avoid in some of the bigger levels. It really sucks to save up 7 chalices, just to have the level crash part way through and eat them all.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom

- Visual changes to coins, and other minor changes.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: I think it OK I like it. I just think you should go through and check the words again. A few words were miss spelt for example HAPPENED HAS 1 N and SEDUCTION doesn't have a K also AUSTRALIA has 1 L. I found a few other words but can't remember them all. Just go through and check but beside that it's a great idea for a game cause it gets the mind going well done.🖒

Words are a bit too easy. They're ok if you're learning English but for us English speakers they're too simple. I suppose though it depends on whether you're a good speller or not. Still, it'd keep me amused whilst sitting on a bus or a train. It IS  a very good way to begin learning English though. 4 stars if there were more variety. Ye the ads are a damn nuisance. It's true it's a speed thing more than a spelling test. So if you're ancient, like me, it Does help the ol brain box think faster.

It is the ever best game of mine. We can learn here many things . Before exam or test all the teachers regularly saying that you must learn all the difficult spellings.  It will help us . So my appeal to all the people who want to make their brain very intelligent  . So please install this attractive game .

Way too many ads, for one thing. Also, since I'm a pretty good speller and move through the various games rather quickly, I feel that the listed "Top 20" scores are unrealistic, some reaching 5 to 6 figures. Can someone explain this to me?
Not bad. Confusing Leaderboard tho. Have to actually move your eye muscles to look for the right name or time of when you played.  Damn I sound like my brother!!

It is a fun game, in fact the game ideas are phenomenal. However, the ads pop up while I am actually playing the game. To top that off, every time I try to go back to the games, it repeats the previous game I did or goes into another ad and freezes at the end. Removing the game for those reasons.
description: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases. Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!Go for highscores!Game modes:- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).Scoring & limits: - your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu Features:* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages* 7 different spelling games* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode* Review all the words you played with in each game* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks* Each game is different* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included* A must game for all the spelling bee fans* 100% free full version with no In-App purchasesHave a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!Support links:Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases.

Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!

Go for highscores!

Game modes:
- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!
- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!
- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!
- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!
- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!
- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!
- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!
- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).

Scoring & limits:
- your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get
- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives
- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu

Features:

* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages
* 7 different spelling games
* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode
* Review all the words you played with in each game
* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode
* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!
* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks
* Each game is different
* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included
* A must game for all the spelling bee fans
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Have a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:
Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/
Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
recentChanges: * Added a PRACTICE mode in which you can practice spelling with no limits (no lives, no time limit)
* Please rate and review the game if you want to support it and want to see more and mainly free features. Thank you!
summary: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational word game for all ages!
title: Spelling Master - Free

comments: Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

description: Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved onesWill you be there for Emily when she needs you most?Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... comments: The makers of this game have put their soul into it, bringing into life every element of the game. The characters are charming and beguiling. I'm in love with princess. 😁 It's the only game where I've invested real cash, and have received  its full worth. The game is an epic. I love it. Cons: Although I've purchased gems, and bought legendary chests, I've only received relatively less efficient cards like lava hound and graveyard which help in game play only if complemented with other cards. It's a bummer. I think they want me to spend more to enjoy more desirable cards.

NejiOmeGa here!🙏 I have got to say this game is a "quick paste first place!" type of game and I love it so far been training like a pro to be on top!!🙇 I've loved it ever since the updates, oh yes did I mention I'm a returning player?? An exquisite job well done I have so many new opportunities to reveal, but so many opponents to show who's Royals! So all is said I just ask that you watch and battle me tuff clasherz😂😂

I don't think I need to 'review' much here. There are some points I definitely don't like about the game. Such as the matchmaking... You get matched with the same deck type in a row. Other than that and some minor flaws it's a great game. I love the competitive aspect about it.  Finally I would suggest some 2v2 with different game modes, such as ramp up 2v2. Also, add the rematch button in 2v2 challenges with random mates.  Hope I hit the 4,3k this season. Good luck to all clashers!

I think Clash Royale is a great game to play and is very well put together for all ages, it is a fast paced game and at the same time can be played with an individual pace of your own to a degree being that there is a clock ticking, also new characters are released at a well balanced rate, so that the game doesn't become boring and the regular balance of the characters strengths and weaknesses are balanced to make the game more competitive. I recommend this game for all ages and abilities. It's great for a few minutes or an hour or so and this game also has several different tournaments you can enjoy yourself or with a friend or a teammate. See you soon on Clash Royale. A.K.A. Dad.

I m lucky enough!!!!!  I just started playing 8 months ago and now I earn 7 legendaries in total and 2 of them are lvl2 where as my friend is playing since more than a year he owes only 6 legendaries and 1 of them is lvl 2..... So plz do something about this we(gamers) expect better from u  Plz don't disappoint them who has low no.s of legendaries....... This is request from all guys who have not got luck in this game I guess...

This is  the best game ever. And supercell, can u add google + sign in so that people who don't use facebook can also have friends.. Also I have like 8 leggie right now and I am so happy. description: Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.A network connection is also required.FEATURES● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV RoyaleSupportAre you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or http://supr.cl/ClashRoyaleForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.Privacy Policy: http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/Parent’s Guide:http://supercell.com/en/parents/
descriptionHTML:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community
● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel
● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV Royale


Support
Are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or http://supr.cl/ClashRoyaleForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy:
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide:
http://supercell.com/en/parents/
recentChanges: • Various minor bug fixes and improvements

summary: Clash Royale is a real-time, head-to-head battle game set in the Clash Universe.

comments: It's fixed   Thank

Fun game and I love the graphics. However the dealer does tend to string along some multi card 21's.  If I have a 12 and take a hit I bust almost every time. If the dealer is showing a 2 I've seen him hit 5 times and get 21. I love to play in the casino. Yes it happens. But not this often.  I have played several different black Jack games. This one is by far the best. I would recommend this game to anyone that loves blackjack.  I do not play poker so I will not comment.

Awesome game with great gameplay and graphics but it's totally rigged towards the dealer. As others have stated, the game lets you win a lot at the start, to draw you in. However, once you get to certain level, you lose at a unrealistic level. I seen the dealers get 3 blackjacks out of 5 games ina row on 2 different tables. Totally rigged. Pretty sure this method is to draw you in and then once you lose a great number of chips, the AI pressures you to buy more chips with REAL currency.

I'm reading these reviews, and I'm shocked.. This is hands down one of the most fair games I've played on mobile. Graphics are excellent. If this game just had one slot game to go along with these table games, this game would have it all. Is it possible to give just one slot game? Anyways, please keep up the great work.

Designed to draw you in with a fair game. Reach a decent amount of chips and you find yourself loosing 14_15  hands consecutively with each hand being 5,6....13,14,15 ext... Dealer pulls some extraordinary results. Buy more chips is bottom line... Piss poor...

Def worth the download. You can play with people that you know easily. Smaller tasks and challenges help you to constantly have ways to get more chips for playing. Great selection of tables, perfect graphics and no issues at all with the program.

comments: It was a good game, until new update. The car body now go to scrap and not in the selling list, thus reduced the profit earning. Also in buildings needs to be repaired, materiap required is of huge quantity. Graphics needs to be better. Game play is easier to understand. Also in bank no complete cash statement is available, like complete diamond spend statement is available and not cash one.  Will surely give 5 star after fixing above points

You had my attention, and now you have my money. Yes, this is a good game. However, it costs too much real money to advance this game. There are many missing pieces and too much to acquire to be able to progress. Maybe instead of making it so in depth, take it down a notch. Let people use junked cars to fix cars and sell them, if this is already an option make it easier to do so. I think this is a good game just too in depth and not enough give to make it entertaining and fun at this time.

The game is over good. It's definitely fun for your car enthusiasts but I am now level 11 and I can't obtain "glass" to build any buildings... The game is getting boring because I can't move up, it's pretty much scrap cars and sell parts... I don't want to rate this game too high because I believe it still is a work in progress, but yes it's a good game and I would recommend it

It's a decent concept. Good time killer for a little while. I don't know why all these games take energy. Just let me play the damn game. And the constantly fluctuating prices to sell the parts got old REAL QUICK! Apparently the creators of this game have never been to a salvage yard in their life.

Game is simple and easy to play but the materials are hard to get and even when have enough to repair a building it's not working. Also the rewards to leveling up are very low for the amount of work needed to get there. After about level 11 or 12 is just more experience but the same $100 and 10 energy cap increase. No diamonds and no material for leveling up. Fix these few issues and I'm sure this game will keep it's fun factor a little longer

Great time killer! Simple to play, though a few information/help would be nice for a few items, the auto sell option and the bailer so you know exactly what they do.  The developer does listen to the players and fixes things! Only true issues that I have are 1)the materials needed to build the buildings in incredibly high, not really obtainable for game play, even for someone who would play constantly
description: Want to start your own vehicle business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of vehicles. It is unique and extremely entertaining.Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling vehicles or vehicle parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car,Truck,Motorbike,Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell vehicle parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills. “Junkyard Tycoon” is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing vehicle business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.************************SAY HELLO************************We are constantly working hard on making the “Junkyard Tycoon” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

comments: Transferring to SD is broken, yet again! Almost every other update re-enables transferring the app data to SD. Is it possible to have this feature permanent? Various updates regularly break it. The option is there, but it keeps giving a generic error message. It isn't my SD card, I have a genuine 64GB Samsung Evo Plus. It is definitely the app itself causing the issue, as I could transfer the previous versions fine. And especially as every single other app with the option to move to SD works fine. This is the only app on my phone with this feature that it intermittently doesn't work.

Honestly i really enjoy the game thus far thank you for all the recent updates niantic... but there is one thing that has been bothering me and that is 1v1 with friends and trading... both features were shown in the original trailer... yet again i love the care your giving the game niantic i truly praise it but i would like to know whats happening with my 2 listed thoughts

Simply just needs more events. I get why trading isnt available yet, which is to prevent RMT and if you have RMT that's just the end of the game. But hope you could soon add the 1v1 battle feature, BUT WITH MOVES LIKE THE REAL GAME NOT JUST TAP AND USING THE SPECIAL SKILL.   Overall love it tho, been walking 2km/day for 2 whole weeks now. description: Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away! Search far and wide for Pokémon and itemsCertain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items. Catching, hatching, evolving, and moreAs you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger. Compete in epic Gym battlesYou’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers. Team up to defeat powerful Raid BossesA Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own! It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!Note: - This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information. - Information current as of December 6, 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.

Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!
Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pokémon and items
Certain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger.

Compete in epic Gym battles
You’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers.

Team up to defeat powerful Raid Bosses
A Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own!

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!

Note:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of December 6, 2017.
developerAddress:
One Ferry Building, Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94111
summary: Step outside and catch Pokémon in the real world! Collect & battle with others.
title: Pokémon GO

description: ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)[HOW TO PLAY]• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.• Just tap the line to remove the wire.[FEATURES]• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!• Play without any limit or restriction!- No lives or No energy.- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!• Simple and Intuitive Design- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.• Highly Optimized Gameplay!- Very light on your device! Download Now!- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.
descriptionHTML:
ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)


[HOW TO PLAY]
• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!
• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.
• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.
• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.
• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.
• Just tap the line to remove the wire.


[FEATURES]
• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!
- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.
- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!

• Play without any limit or restriction!
- No lives or No energy.
- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!

• Simple and Intuitive Design
- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.

• Highly Optimized Gameplay!
- Very light on your device! Download Now!
- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.

comments: Initially got 3 stars for forcing me to rate it after one level, but to reach the third level trying to force me to rate it again on facebook. You now get 1 star. Not everyone is on facebook and not everyone wants to rate everything 7 times before you can use it properly wich seems to be the case with this application. Its a pity because it looked as if it could have been useful.

I love the tutorial it gives and the introduction to playing. It's great. Very helpful, easy to understand.  I do not like how it forces You to rate the app to be able to progress to level 2 but it's worth it, I suppose. Using this as part of homeschooling and teaching my daughter and niece piano lessons..... so far they are doing great with it. Thank You!

This app is really very good... As the name suggests it is really a piano teacher but there are too many adds that you can't really play the game properly. I like how it explains the basics and makes it easier.If there was an option to play  and learn any song we like and love.Thank u very much. You can actually believe this app and download it everything has something good and bad but that's not a problem. Really it teaches good.....

Good game just has two different adds that are constant and very annoying.  Hate google ads . They always take up 25 percent of the screen. Im ready to get rid of google app all together. I hate agressive! Other than that, this is a good learning game

I initially gave it 4 stars because I had to rate it to get to lesson 2. But now it won't let me watch lesson 5 without watching an ad. I've watched 3 of these stupid ads and it's still not working. Uninstalling. Don't waste your time.
You cannot go through to the next level unless you watch the ad videos twice. This is so sad. I thought it would be better but waaay too many adds.

descriptionHTML:
Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!

Enjoy this endless paradise.

Build, destroy, move, fly, jump and craft. And all this for free !!!

There are over 100 different items in your inventory to build separate rooms including a living room, bedroom, toilet, bathroom, a private garden, a house for animals.

Easily place the standard blocks that you want to install and use them to build something, you can build everything you can imagine.

Choose creativity or survival mode, move through your world and make it more remarkable.

Move through this endless world in flight, save your work, and play again later.

Everyone loves Kraft games, they have become popular all over the world; You can start with a few blocks and gradually build an empire.

Explore and start developing your dream. You can use many different items, so you can create your ideal Kingdom. The game is infinite, which makes it so intriguing.

★★★★★ PLEASE RATE THIS GAME WITH 5 STARS★★★★★

For those who still see the error at the beginning. Go into the settings of your phone. Selects programs and games. Look for our game: Exploration Prime. Choose this. Then you can grant permissions to the game. Then you need to give the game permission to write to your storage. After that, the game will work.

Enjoy!

The game Exploration Prime is an open source project which is subject to the LGPLv3 license. Before using the code, you must read the entire license and agree to it.

comments: This is a really good game. I tend to be cynical about mobile games because they're usually pay to win these days but this game seems to have a very fair progression system. It's also refreshing that it's single player. That seems to be getting rare these days. My one suggestion is that there be more levels and things to do. I've only been playing for 4 days and I'm already nearing the end of the campaign. Add more missions or maybe another game mode and this game will easily earn 5 stars from me.

Great time passer! This is one of the better helicopter games I have played. The sound effects are realistic along with graphics and gameplay. No regrets or bad feelings from me. This game is on both phones and my tablet. Love it!

update game and increase more level and There are some Item which we will never  unlock and get up to 2-3 years and signIn problem facing even it is Not completed 30 days i lost my all progress just because of Poor Technology and Software error auto rejected progress i want back my all Progress i was completed 25 days Journey.

Game is good but am stuck in level 18 kill all enemy and have detected one area Buuuttt can't detect another area damn Stuck here play every day still cannot proceed to the next level do you hear my problem game developers please fix this issue if you can do it.
Too many bugs on chapter 4 and 5. Always showing ads pop up on 4-3, so many sinking ship still running and bombing on 5-4, and sometimes the game suddenly shutdown..

It's great overall, but two months in a row, I have been carefully and patiently waiting for the sign-in rewards to get a better machine gun, and like others have noted, my daily sign-in calendar reset both times. I won't be waiting another month.

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

OH MY GOD!!! ARE YOU KIDDING ME WITH THIS?!?! I DOWNLOADED THE APP JUST TO RATE IT. YOUR AD, IS IDENTICAL TO CLASH OF CLANS!!!! THIS IS JUST PATHETIC. BEING A CLASH OF CLANS PLAYER, I FIND THIS VERY INSULTING AND DISRESPECTFUL. HAVE FUN WITH MY 1 STAR REVIEW!!!

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers

World chat is more like a dating site and is not child friendly. The admins do nothing to stop the behaviour in world chat. I strongly advise you not to allow your kids anywhere near this game

No good for kids. Game is nothing special, there are 100s like it. Public chat is full of perverts and filth. Nothing you would want your kids exposed to. Currently no way to disable chat or report abuse so players can openly sexually harass other players. Safe for adults only.

description: Draw as many lines or polygons as needed to gradually make the ball fall into the U. Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. comments: Great story like being in the story myself

Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!
I really like the plots to this game and that it's in Rio. Interesting love story. No matter how much I put Linda with Bruno, she loves Rodrigo.  It's very addictive
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
If she will be with Rodrigo again, Im not playing this anymore. This drama is so boring. No matter what I do, she will always choose Rodrigo. I want her with Bruno !

description: Blaze and AJ need to use his blazing speed and upgrades to help rescue his friends from crafty Crusher's trap!Take the wheel and drive Blaze over ramps and obstacles! Do cool tricks, activate his super speed, and transform into different gadgets like in the show!Who will get to the top of Mount Dragon first? Blaze and AJ need help to speed past Crusher's obstacles to win the Dragon Island Duel!This game will outstand you, boys, and we say boys because it's a car racing game and well, let's face it, there are few girls that love to play cars games, especially racing cars, and you boys sure do have the skills to play this kind of games. We uploaded this game category for boys, and the first game from this category is called Blaze blaze race of the rescue. Blaze and his best friend AJ were challenged by their rival, Crusher, on a race along the dangerous race of the rescue, but Crusher is not playing fair, using cheat tips, so, your two best friends, Blaze and AJ are really counting on your help. You have to watch out for the obstacles such as big rocks and oil puddles, and on your way up to the top try to collect as many red flags as possible in order to beat Crusher.
descriptionHTML:
Blaze and AJ need to use his blazing speed and upgrades to help rescue his friends from crafty Crusher's trap!
Take the wheel and drive Blaze over ramps and obstacles! Do cool tricks, activate his super speed, and transform into different gadgets like in the show!
Who will get to the top of Mount Dragon first? Blaze and AJ need help to speed past Crusher's obstacles to win the Dragon Island Duel!

This game will outstand you, boys, and we say boys because it's a car racing game and well, let's face it, there are few girls that love to play cars games, especially racing cars, and you boys sure do have the skills to play this kind of games. We uploaded this game category for boys, and the first game from this category is called Blaze blaze race of the rescue. Blaze and his best friend AJ were challenged by their rival, Crusher, on a race along the dangerous race of the rescue, but Crusher is not playing fair, using cheat tips, so, your two best friends, Blaze and AJ are really counting on your help. You have to watch out for the obstacles such as big rocks and oil puddles, and on your way up to the top try to collect as many red flags as possible in order to beat Crusher.

comments: Love this game but can be frustrating when I hit the zombies and they keep going and I lose the game. After a while I have to stop as I get too excited. I hate the hiding construction workers. If I don't knock them out at the top of the screen, they get too low down and I miss them. Hate it when I accidentally hit the people when the game throws everything at you. I have a super fast finger, but, sometimes not fast enough. It takes concentration and fast reflexes to advance in this game. I gave it 5 stars.  Might go and read the help section for tips. All I want to say is try it.

One of the best games out there!  The only thing I would change is the placement of the power tools as I will often activate one when killing a zombie. Great work!  Hope there is a version II coming out soon!  Cheers! ☆☆☆  I've sent an email to the devs about no bonus brains in survival mode but after uninstall/reinstall there was the odd one popping up; however I feel there should be more to reward the player.  Cheers what up devs I didn't play for a few weeks and my progress and settings where wiped out...I started playing zombie smacker...are you the same devs???

Just redownloaded also to a bigger phone for better game play.  I like so far ow there is a variety of card games to play in one app than multiple apps. It saves storage space.

Love having the magic wand for multiple helps instead of just one time. Good going, guys and girls. 😎

description: Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks). ⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡ - Classic Solitaire Gameplay:We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.- Fun & Addictive Challenges:Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design. ✅ INCLUDES ✅- CLASSIC SOLITAIREIn Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!- SPIDER SOLITAIREPlay with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!- FREECELL SOLITAIREWin a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!- PYRAMID SOLITAIRECombine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRESelect cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!- DAILY CHALLENGESLooking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!- TOURNAMENTJoin the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!✨ FEATURES ✨♠ Daily challenges with different levels♠ Customizable beautiful themes♠ 2 Players Tournaments♠ 4 Players Tournaments♠ Up to 10 top records♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards ♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring♠ Timer mode♠ Left-handed mode♠ Landscape mode♠ Multiple languages supported♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards♠ Auto-collect cards on completion♠ Auto-save game in play♠ Feature to Undo moves♠ Feature to use Hints♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE! ★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★Any problems or question? Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com
descriptionHTML:
Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks).


⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡

- Classic Solitaire Gameplay:
We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.

- Fun & Addictive Challenges:
Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!

- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:
By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design.

 
✅ INCLUDES ✅

- CLASSIC SOLITAIRE
In Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!

- SPIDER SOLITAIRE
Play with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!

- FREECELL SOLITAIRE
Win a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!

- PYRAMID SOLITAIRE
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!

- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRE
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!

- DAILY CHALLENGES
Looking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!

- TOURNAMENT
Join the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!


✨ FEATURES ✨

♠ Daily challenges with different levels
♠ Customizable beautiful themes
♠ 2 Players Tournaments
♠ 4 Players Tournaments
♠ Up to 10 top records
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards
♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring
♠ Timer mode
♠ Left-handed mode
♠ Landscape mode
♠ Multiple languages supported
♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
♠ Auto-collect cards on completion
♠ Auto-save game in play
♠ Feature to Undo moves
♠ Feature to use Hints
♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required
 
Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?
It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!
Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!

COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE!
★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★

Any problems or question?
Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com
summary: Solitaire Collection offers FIVE of the best Solitaire card games in one app!
title: Solitaire Collection

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¶:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield
